mapper.select: SELECT jbbx1.* from jjg_fbgc_jtaqss_jabx jbbx1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM jjg_fbgc_jtaqss_jabx WHERE proname=#{proname} and htd=#{htd} and fbgc=#{fbgc}) jabx2 on jbbx1.id=jabx2.id WHERE jbbx1.bxnfsxsgdz is not null and jbbx1.bxscz1 is not null and jbbx1.bxscz2 is not null and jbbx1.bxscz3 is not null and jbbx1.bxscz4 is not null and jbbx1.bxscz5 is not null

SELECT jbbx1.* from jjg_fbgc_jtaqss_jabx jbbx1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM jjg_fbgc_jtaqss_jabx WHERE proname=#{proname} and htd=#{htd} and fbgc=#{fbgc}) jabx2 on jbbx1.id=jabx2.id WHERE jbbx1.hxnfsxsgdz is not null and jbbx1.hxscz1 is not null and jbbx1.hxscz2 is not null and jbbx1.hxscz3 is not null and jbbx1.hxscz4 is not null and jbbx1.hxscz5 is not null
select COUNT(DISTINCT(wz)) wz FROM jjg_fbgc_jtaqss_jabx where proname = #{proname} and htd = #{htd}
